transcript_text: Agent: Good afternoon, IndiaMART Seller Success Team. This is Deepak. How may I assist you today? Seller: Hello Deepak, I am Venkatesh Reddy calling from Bangalore. I own Reddy Industrial Supplies. I need to have a serious conversation about my account and whether I should continue with IndiaMART or not. Agent: Good afternoon Mr. Reddy. I can see your account - you have been with us for 18 months with the Silver TrustSEAL package. I am sorry to hear you are having doubts. Please share your concerns and I will do my best to address them. Seller: Deepak, let me give you some background. I left my corporate job 2 years ago to start this industrial supplies business. I deal in safety equipment, industrial tools, and PPE kits. I invested heavily in inventory and joined IndiaMART thinking it would bring me customers. Agent: That is a significant career decision sir. How has your experience been so far? Seller: Mixed, to be honest. First 6 months were good. I was getting 40-50 inquiries per month and converting about 20 percent. I was happy. Then something changed around 6 months ago. Inquiries dropped to 15-20 per month and quality also became poor. Agent: Let me look at your analytics sir. I can see there was a category restructuring in June where Industrial Safety Equipment was split into multiple sub-categories. Your products might be spread across these categories now, reducing visibility in any single search. Have you reviewed your category mappings recently? Seller: Nobody informed me about this category change! How am I supposed to know? Agent: I apologize sir, we should have communicated better. Category changes are announced through email newsletters and seller dashboard notifications. Do you regularly check those? Seller: Honestly no. I get so many emails from IndiaMART - promotions, tips, updates - I have started ignoring them. There is too much noise. Agent: That is valid feedback sir. We are working on better email categorization so critical updates stand out. In the meantime, let me help you fix your category mappings. I can see you have 156 products. About 40 of them are currently in a general Other Industrial Supplies category which has very low visibility. Seller: So what do I need to do? Agent: I can initiate a bulk category review for you. Our catalog team will analyze each product and suggest the optimal category. For Silver members, this is normally Rs 5000 but I will get it done complimentary given the communication gap from our side. Seller: Okay that would help. But Deepak, I have a bigger concern. My competitors are offering the same products at lower prices. When I check IndiaMART, I see sellers offering safety helmets at Rs 50 when my cost price itself is Rs 80. How are they doing this? Agent: This is a common concern sir. A few possibilities - some sellers list low prices to attract inquiries and then increase prices during negotiation. Some may be dealing in lower quality products. And unfortunately, some listings may be fraudulent. Are you losing orders specifically due to price comparisons? Seller: Yes! Buyers contact me, I give them a genuine quote, and then they say another IndiaMART seller is offering 40 percent lower. Either I match the price and make a loss, or I lose the order. Agent: Sir, this is where your TrustSEAL verification becomes valuable. Buyers who have been burned by low-quality suppliers or fraudulent sellers look specifically for TrustSEAL verified suppliers. You should highlight your certifications, quality guarantees, and genuine product sourcing in your listings. Price-conscious buyers may go elsewhere, but quality-conscious buyers will come to you. Seller: But how do buyers know I am genuine just from TrustSEAL? Agent: Good question sir. TrustSEAL verification includes business document verification, site visits, and ongoing monitoring. You can also add customer testimonials, upload quality certificates like ISO or BIS, and use our Product Authenticity Badge for branded items. Let me check - I see you have ISO 9001 certification but it is not uploaded to your profile. That should definitely be there. Seller: I did not know I could upload that. Where do I do it? Agent: In your Seller Dashboard, go to Business Profile and then Certifications section. You can upload up to 10 certificates. I will send you a step-by-step guide after this call. Certified sellers get a 25 percent boost in search rankings. Seller: That is useful. Now I have another issue. I am getting too many tire-kickers. People who ask for quotes, I spend time preparing detailed quotations, and then they disappear. No response to follow-ups. I have calculated - I spend about 15 hours per week on quotations that go nowhere. Agent: That is a significant time investment sir. Have you considered using our Quick Quote templates? Instead of preparing custom quotes each time, you can create 5-6 standard quote templates for your most common products. This can reduce your quotation time by 70 percent. Seller: I did not know about Quick Quote. Why are these features so hidden? Agent: Fair point sir. We have over 40 seller tools but many sellers are not aware of them. Would you be interested in a Seller Success Consultation? It is a 45-minute session where we review your account and show you all the features relevant to your business. For Silver members, we offer this twice a year free. Seller: Yes, please arrange that. But coming back to my main question - should I upgrade to Gold or even Platinum? Will that really make a difference? I am currently paying Rs 15000 per year. Agent: Let me be honest with you sir, because I would rather have a satisfied Silver customer than a disappointed Gold customer. Upgrading makes sense if - one, you have optimized your current catalog and are hitting Silver plan limits. Two, you are in a competitive category where premium placement matters. Three, you have capacity to handle increased inquiries. Looking at your account, I would recommend first optimizing what you have. Do the category correction, upload certificates, set up Quick Quote, and do the Success Consultation. Review results for 2 months. If you see improvement and want more, then upgrade. Seller: That is surprisingly honest advice. Most sales people would just push the upgrade. Agent: Sir, my job is seller success, not just sales. If you upgrade without fixing fundamentals, you will be disappointed and leave in 6 months. If I help you succeed at Silver level, you will naturally want to grow with us. Seller: I appreciate that Deepak. Now let me ask about something else. I want to expand into government tenders. A lot of industrial supplies are procured through government contracts. Does IndiaMART help with that? Agent: Excellent growth strategy sir! We have a dedicated Government e-Marketplace integration service. GeM, as it is called, is a massive opportunity. We can help you register on GeM, list your products, and even alert you to relevant tenders. This is part of our Business Growth services. The basic package is Rs 8000 one-time setup plus Rs 2000 monthly. Seller: That sounds expensive for a small business like mine. Agent: I understand sir. Let me check if we have any offers. Actually, we have a promotion running this month - if you sign up for GeM integration along with your Silver renewal, we waive the monthly fee for the first 6 months. So you only pay Rs 8000 setup. Seller: When is my renewal due? Agent: Your Silver package renews on February 1st. You have about 7 weeks left. Seller: Let me think about the GeM service. But tell me one thing that has been bothering me. I see IndiaMART advertising heavily on TV and digital. Does that bring genuine buyers or just more tire-kickers? Agent: Our advertising is designed to attract serious B2B buyers. We specifically target business owners, procurement managers, and industry professionals. However, more visibility does mean more diverse inquiries. The key is to filter and qualify leads. Are you using the inquiry questionnaire feature? Seller: What is that? Agent: You can set up 3-5 qualifying questions that buyers must answer before they can contact you. For example - What is your approximate order quantity? What is your timeline for purchase? Are you the decision maker? This filters out casual browsers and students. Seller: That is brilliant! Why was this not told to me earlier? Please enable this for me. Agent: I will send you the setup guide sir. You can customize the questions based on your business. Sellers using this feature report 35 percent better lead quality. Seller: Good. Now my last concern - I have been reading about AI and how it is changing e-commerce. Is IndiaMART using AI? Will my business become obsolete? Agent: Great question sir and very relevant. IndiaMART is actively investing in AI. We use AI for lead scoring, fraud detection, and catalog optimization. We are also testing AI-powered tools that help sellers respond to inquiries faster with suggested responses. For your business specifically, AI is an opportunity not a threat. AI can help you be more efficient, not replace you. Personal relationships and trust still matter in B2B, especially in industrial supplies. Seller: That is reassuring. I was worried robots would take over. Agent: Ha ha, not yet sir. AI assists but human judgment remains essential. Now let me summarize what we discussed. I will initiate free category review for your 156 products. I am sending you guides for uploading ISO certificate and setting up Quick Quote templates and inquiry questionnaire. I am scheduling a Seller Success Consultation within the next 2 weeks. For your renewal, I have noted your interest in GeM integration with the promotional pricing. Shall I also set a reminder to follow up with you in 2 months to review progress? Seller: Yes please do that. Deepak, I came into this call ready to cancel my subscription. But you have given me practical solutions and honest advice. I will give it another 6 months. Agent: Thank you for your trust sir. I genuinely want to see your business succeed. Remember, I am here to help. You can ask for me by name - Deepak, Employee ID 45892 - whenever you call. I will track your account personally. Seller: That means a lot. Thank you Deepak. You are very different from other support people I have spoken to. Agent: Thank you sir. That is the best compliment I can receive. All the guides and action items will be in your email within 3 hours. Is there anything else I can help with today? Seller: No, that is all. You have given me a lot to work on. Agent: Perfect sir. Best wishes for your business growth. The industrial supplies market in Bangalore is booming and with the right optimization, you will definitely capture your share. Have a great day Mr. Reddy. Seller: Thank you Deepak. Goodbye. Agent: Goodbye sir. Take care.
